issue.title: [CI][R][C++] Add -Wall to fedora-clang-devel as-cran checks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13510](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13510). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We got a build failure (warning, but enough to draw the ire of CRAN) running on a bespoke machine configured like this: https://www.stats.ox.ac.uk/pub/bdr/Rconfig/r-devel-linux-x86_64-fedora-clang

We test on a fedora-clang-devel image from R-hub, but it doesn't have the same flags set, so we didn't catch it.
